name: Dice Versa (CRYPT1X)
description:
Dodge the one-armed bandits and crush them with your magic dice! What you need to know:

Disclaimer: The stuff listed below is the idea for the game, the game isn't finished yet

  • Play in fullscreen for more space to move around
  • Move around with WASD
  • The one-armed bandits are the enemies, they spawn every so often and wander around the room
  • If one of the enemies touches you, you die
  • When you kill them by rolling over them with your dice, you get points for the number of enemies you hit with your roll, squared.* This introduces tactics and combos into the game
  • Aim your magic dice with the arrow keys and press space to roll it
  • The side that the dice lands on will change something about the dice
    • If it lands on one, the dice will get smaller
    • It it lands on two the dice will get bigger
    • If it lands on three the dice will roll less far
    • If it lands on four the dice will roll further
    • If it lands on five the dice will roll slower
    • If it lands on six the dice will roll faster
  • To roll the dice again you first need to get it back
  • * Examples: if you hit one enemie with one dice roll, you'll get 1 point, if you hit two enemies you get 4 points, three enemies gets you 9 points and so on.
Known issues:
  • You can't throw the dice in the direction top-left
